name: CraftOut
description:
CraftOut - a game that tells the story of the disaster of the future. You will be able to collect from dozens of details of an armored car of unique design, and go out into the open world, full of dangers and various riches. The game is in open testing.

History

2124 year. On the ground suddenly fell a meteor shower. Technology, as well as space monitoring and exploration missions, did not help detect the danger until it was too late...
A week later, creatures that could be classified as new and seemingly reasonable life forms began to appear on the surface. We do not know what their purpose on our Earth is, but their arrival alone killed 99% of humanity.
2127. New Eden" was founded, which is engaged in search of ways to restore society and research of anomalies on the surface of the earth. You have joined their mission.

Welcome to the apocalypse!

In this game you will build your car on which you will explore the game world. You will meet and fight with other players for valuable resources.

Anomalies are everywhere!

Each time you go out of the bunker to the surface will inevitably lead to a meeting with anomalies that can both complicate and simplify your adventure.

People never change!

Every player you meet can become your friend or just take your booty and leave. You have to be careful with new acquaintances.
